ui's repository um and it's also fairly stable but it is

oh yeah all right uh Argo has uh sort of reduced some of that complexity or
rather it's introduced abstractions that we all use to leverage the complexity of kubernetes but Argo is also very complex
and so the UI sort of reduces the cognitive load that is required for
using Argo and I think that the UI is sort of Argos superpower in a lot of ways and it is an advantage that we

powerful um and it makes kubernetes more approachable
